name: mithril-ui-form-project
description: Based on a JSON document, generate a UI form for the Mithril framework.
author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)

scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && pnpm patch-release
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && pnpm minor-release
